io.sarl.maven.bootiqueapp

Class BootiqueMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.maven.bootiqueapp.BootiqueMain

  • public class BootiqueMain
extends Object
    Class that implements the standard main function for running a SARL application with bootique modules.
    Since:
    0.8
    Version:
    io.sarl.maven.bootiqueapp 0.12.0 20210527-171007
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl.maven
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.sarl.maven.bootiqueapp

    • Method Detail

      • isExperimental

        public def isExperimental() : boolean 
        Description copied from class: BootiqueMain
        Replies if this application is an experimental application.

        Usually a warning message is displayed at launch time when the application is experimental.

        Returns:
        true if experimental.

      • createRuntime

        protected def createRuntime(args : String*) : io.bootique.BQRuntime 
        Description copied from class: BootiqueMain
        Create the compiler runtime. This function loads any modules available on class-path that expose BQModuleProvider provider. Use with caution, you may load more modules than you expected. Make sure only needed Bootique dependencies are included on class-path. If in doubt, switch to explicit Module loading via BootiqueMain.createRuntime(Class[], String...).
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments.
        Returns:
        the runtime.

      • createRuntime

        protected def createRuntime(modules : Class<? extends io.bootique.BQModuleProvider>[],
                            args : String*) : io.bootique.BQRuntime 
        Description copied from class: BootiqueMain
        Create the compiler runtime.
        Parameters:
        modules - the list of module to be loaded.
        args - the command line arguments.
        Returns:
        the runtime.
        Since:
        0.12

      • runCommand

        public def runCommand(args : String*) : int 
        Description copied from class: BootiqueMain
        Run the associated commands.

        This function runs the command and exits with the return code.

        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments.
        Returns:
        the exit code.

      • getOptions

        public final def getOptions() : List<io.bootique.help.HelpOption> 
        Description copied from class: BootiqueMain
        Replies the options of the program. This function loads any modules available on class-path that expose BQModuleProvider provider. Use with caution, you may load more modules than you expected. Make sure only needed Bootique dependencies are included on class-path. If in doubt, switch to explicit Module loading via BootiqueMain.getOptionsForModules(Class...).
        Returns:
        the options of the program.

      • getOptionsForModules

        public final def getOptionsForModules(modules : Class<? extends io.bootique.BQModuleProvider>[]) : List<io.bootique.help.HelpOption> 
        Description copied from class: BootiqueMain
        Replies the options of the program that are provided by a specific set of modules.
        Parameters:
        modules - the list of modules to be loaded.
        Returns:
        the options of the program.
        Since:
        0.12

        Description copied from class: BootiqueMain
        Replies the statically defined modules.
        Parameters:
        names - the list of fully-qualified names of the modules providers.
        Returns:

        Since:
